channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Anchovy and samphire spaghetti
item.description:
Anchovy and samphire spaghetti



Both samphire and anchovy pack a really salty punch. Combining the two results in a simple little dish which delivers big on flavour..

item.title: Storecupboard pasta salad
item.description:
Storecupboard pasta salad



This pasta salad makes a quick and healthy lunch, or is perfect prepared ahead for a picnic or lunchbox.

item.title: Tuna-macaroni salad
item.description:
Tuna-macaroni salad



If there is such a thing as comfort salad, then this is it: A cold and creamy, mayonnaise-laden pasta that evokes your grandma's "tuna mac", but made a touch more sophisticated with the addition of cornichons and scallions..

item.title: Thai-style fishcakes
item.description:
Thai-style fishcakes



Here the fishcakes are paired with a ribbon salad, but you could also make bigger ones to eat as a burger, served in a lettuce wrap .

item.title: Lamb kheema with naan bread
item.description:
Lamb kheema with naan bread



You may have heard of kheema before in Indian restaurants, where it is a type of naan bread. Kheema is basically a traditional Indian dish that contains lamb mince. Gluten-free: make sure the stock cube is gluten-free and serve with rice instead of naans..

item.title: Chicken in black bean sauce
item.description:
Chicken in black bean sauce



Gluten-free: make sure the stock cube, soy and black bean sauce are gluten-free..
